title: These segregating distances from the adjoining plot as stated above shall not be insisted upon where non-industrial development has already been permitted by conversion of zone in the said adjoining plot situated in Industrial zone
clause_text: These segregating distances from the adjoining plot as stated above shall not be insisted upon where non-industrial development has already been permitted by conversion of zone in the said adjoining plot situated in Industrial zone.
